Learn more about us Frequently asked questions about gifts from India We are always happy to help. Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about buying gifts from India Contact us How long does it take to receive a gift from India? We process orders within 24 hours. If you have a tracking number, you can track your item until it arrives at its destination. Please note that delivery times can vary depending on the shipping method and location of the recipient Can I return or exchange a gift from India? Unfortunately, we do not offer item exchange or returns. But please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns. We are always happy to help with any issues you may have with your purchase Are the gifts from India authentic? Yes, all of our products are handmade by local artisans in India. We only sell authentic, high-quality products that are made with love and care. Every item is a unique piece of art that reflects the beauty and diversity of the Indian culture Do you offer discounts or promotions? We do not offer discounts or promotions at this time. However, we are always looking for ways to improve our prices and make our products more affordable. If you have any suggestions or ideas, please let us know What our customers say about our products - Sarah, Texas “I was blown away by the quality of the gift I received! pages.index: Gift Gallery - Indian Gifts Online Store About us Our products FAQs Reviews +91-245-8174102 giftgallery@gmail.com Explore the rich culture of India Discover a world of unmatched beauty, history, and craftsmanship with our collection of handmade gifts and souvenirs from India. From vibrant textiles and intricate jewelry to exquisite ceramics and exotic spices, we offer a wide range of unique and authentic Indian gifts. Shop Now About Our Store At GiftGallery, we offer a wide range of authentic Indian handmade gifts and souvenirs that are not only beautiful but also unique and of high quality. Our store is located in the heart of India, but we specialize in Indian handmade gifts and souvenirs that are popular among people all over the world. From vibrant textiles and intricate jewelry to exquisite ceramics and exotic spices, we offer a wide range of unique and authentic Indian gifts. We are committed to providing our customers with the best Indian handmade gifts and souvenirs that they can find anywhere. Our team of experts curates our collection of products from India, ensuring that every gift is of the highest quality and meets our customers’ expectations. Our extensive range of products At GiftGallery, we offer a vast and diverse range of authentic Indian handmade gifts and souvenirs that are not only beautiful but also unique and of high quality. From luxurious silk saris to exquisite handmade crafts, each product in our collection is crafted with the greatest attention to detail and care. Whether you are looking for a thoughtful gift for a friend or family member, or simply want to add a touch of Indian culture to your home, we have something for everyone. How GiftGallery was born The story of GiftGallery begins in 2015, when two friends from India decided to start a business together. They had both been traveling to India for many years, falling in love with the culture, artisans and traditions of this beautiful country. They realized that there was a demand for authentic Indian handmade gifts and souvenirs in the international market, but the options were limited and often of poor quality. They decided to fill this gap and started GiftGallery, a platform for Indian artisans to showcase their wares and connect with a global audience. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - GiftGallery - Indian Gifts and Souvenirs About us Our products FAQs Reviews +91-245-8174102 giftgallery@gmail.com Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Gift Gallery (referred to as "we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name and email address, when you contact us via email at giftgallery@gmail.com. How We Use Your Information We use the information you provide to respond to your inquiries and communicate with you. Your email address, provided to us at giftgallery@gmail.com, is used solely for the purpose of corresponding with you. Protection of Your Information We are committed to protecting the security of your personal information. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Disclosure of Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. However, we may disclose your information when required by law or in response to legal process, to protect our rights, or to enforce our site policies. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. These websites have their own privacy policies, which you should review when you visit them. We have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, with the updated Privacy Policy revision date. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at giftgallery@gmail.com. Limitation of Liability In no event shall Gift Gallery or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold Gift Gallery and its affiliates harmless from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, or expenses (including legal fees) arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services or your violation of these Terms. Changes to These Terms We reserve the right to update or change these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of our website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
